name: UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat
desc: A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of an image renderer context.

items.name: init(for: UITraitCollection)
items.desc: Creates the most suitable format for rendering on a device with the specified traits.

items.name: var opaque: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the underlying Core Graphics context has an alpha channel.

items.name: var scale: CGFloat
items.desc: The display scale of the image renderer context.

items.name: var preferredRange: UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range
items.desc: The preferred color range of the image renderer context.

items.name: enum UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range
items.desc: Constants that specify the color range of the image renderer context.
